analysis.key_quote: This proposed new regulation would inject political interference into the research grant assessment and award process and destroy the scientific integrity of the federal grant award process and thus devastate the most successful biomedical research program in the world and prevent the development of new cures and treatments for cancers and countless other diseases that adversely impact the health of Americans.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on scientific integrity and the effectiveness of biomedical research, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
